code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/auth/login',{email,password});localStorage.setItem('token',response.data.token);console.log(response.data.token);window.location.reload('/homepage');}catch(error){alert('Invalid email or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center min-vh-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loginCard p-5 shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"logoText",children:"COOK"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Sign in"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",className:"form-label",children:"Email address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control",type:"email",value:email,placeholder:"@gmail.com",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",className:"form-label",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"form-control",id:"password",placeholder:"********"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-grid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary btn-block",children:"SIGN IN"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/register",children:"Create an account"})]})})]})})});};export default Login;
